ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... floor) ... We had this a while back, while our invis song make work in unrest it does not work in Lower guk, once you hit level 35+ you are gonna want to
ygData.messageBody:
>> Level 39: Invis to Undead (useful in Lower guk etc)

>Our current invis song works against the undead. I've walked unmolested
>throughout all of Unrest (including a fully spawned basement and third
floor)
>enough times to verify this.

We had this a while back, while our invis song make work in unrest it does
not work in Lower guk, once you hit level 35+ you are gonna want to start
going to Lower guk, so having our level 39 song invis to undead would be
useful. I often have to wait at the zone until I can get an invis.

>I've like to see a healing equivalent of Desperate Dirge. Uses 800 mana,
and
>does a massive group heal.

Now I like this idea, very good. Makes the bard a kind of 1 off life saver
for the group. thus increasing the bards value to a group!!
